caption.p: LSVs of PEO based SPE with a scan rate of 0.1 mV/s on ( a) Pt and ( b) conductive carbon working electrode resulting in an exponential increase in current density of 4.9 and 4.6 V vs. Li/Li +, respectively. ( c) Determination of the onset of main oxidation of PEO based SPEs via overcharge of the working electrode with a specific current of 15 mA g âˆ’1 using different positive electrodes.
